subject: Cybersecurity
title: The Five Eyes Alliance: Global Surveillance Network
description: A fast breakdown of The Five Eyes Alliance: Global Surveillance Network for builders.

hook.text: Five countries share every piece of intelligence they collect â€” creating the most powerful spy network in history.

buildup.text: Five Eyes (US, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand) was born from WWII codebreaking cooperation and never stopped.

discovery.text: Each country specializes: NSA handles signals intelligence, GCHQ taps undersea cables, CSE covers the Arctic.

twist.text: A key loophole: each country can spy on the others' citizens and share the data â€” bypassing domestic surveillance laws.

climax.text: Five Eyes collects more digital intelligence than any single nation could alone â€” a surveillance force multiplier.

punchline.text: Five nations share everything. Your data crosses all five.

quiz.question: Which countries form the Five Eyes alliance?
options: US, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand
